author: alexandair
body:
Added newlines following one-sentence-per-line principle.
Changed "Open PowerShell" to "PowerShell".
Fixed typos.

comments.author: joeyaiello
comments.body: LGTM other than the wonkiness of extra newlines in between list items. Unless @vors for @andschwa has a reason for that, I think there generally shouldn't be extra blank newlines in a bulleted list (though, to be clear, there should still be semantic line breaks after each sentence).

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: This should be rebased onto master, where we have the necessary changes to enable Travis CI builds from forks (yay!).

title: Update README.md
